poweb.title: Poweb
poweb.detailedDescription: School administration system developed with React, Node, and TypeScript, created to replace the legacy system and improve the processes of institutions within the Senac network. The project includes over 20 modules with complete CRUD operations, including features such as a message board, class management, environments, and expenses.

features.auth: Integration with an external API-based authentication system.
features.profile: User profile management with customizable permission levels.
features.files: File upload and download within the message board.
